Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.query.assignment.Assignment

Packages that use Assignment
Package
Description
org.hibernate.query.assignment
Support for assignment with MutationSpecification.
org.hibernate.query.specification
Support for SelectionSpecification and MutationSpecification which is similar in concept to criteria queries, but focused on ease-of-use and less verbosity.

    Description

    static <T, X> Assignment<T>
    Assignment.set(SingularAttribute<T,X> attribute, X value)
    An assigment of the given literal value to the given attribute of the root entity.
    static <T, X> Assignment<T>
    Assignment.set(Path<T,X> path, Path<T,X> value)
    An assigment of one entity or embeddable field or property to another entity or embeddable field or property, each identified by a given path from the root entity.
    static <T, X> Assignment<T>
